content:
the Observer is a studentrun daily print  online newspaper serving Notre Dame Saint Marys  Holy Cross PERIOD Learn about us PERIOD

Bill Brink  Wednesday January  

It may not ease the pain of losing a National Championship but being named the best player in the country cant hurt PERIOD

Irish senior forward Kerri Hanks won the MAC Hermann Trophy awarded to the best Div PERIOD I player for the second time in four years becoming the fourth player ever to win the award twice PERIOD She joins Mia Hamm and Cindy Parlow from North Carolina and Christine Sinclair from Portland State the other twotime recipients PERIOD

Im grateful to everyone at Notre Dame  my teammates coaches staff and our fans who are the greatest in the country  for all of their support not only this year but throughout my career Hanks said in a statement released by the athletic department PERIOD I will always treasure the friendships I made at Notre Dame and will carry those memories with me forever. hanks led the Irish to the National Championship game against North Carolina where the Irish lost  on Dec PERIOD  PERIOD Before that the Irish had not lost all season PERIOD

Hanks beat out North Carolinas Casey Nogueira and UCLAs Christian DiMartino PERIOD She holds  school records and was a fouryear AllAmerica selection PERIOD She ranked fifth in the nation in  with  goals third in assists with  and second in points with  PERIOD

Im just so proud of her and all that shes accomplished during her four years at Notre Dame Irish coach Randy Waldrum said in the statement PERIOD Shes evolved into a complete player on the field and a complete person off of it PERIOD The caring compassion and generosity she shows not only to her teammates but to everyone she comes in contact with is second to none PERIOD She is someone that has set a standard that others will be compared to for years to come. she was the Big East Offensive Player of the Year a fourtime conference Offensive Player of the Week and was a firstteam allconference selection PERIOD

Hanks also won the  Lowes Senior CLASS Award presented to the senior athlete who combined onfield performance with service PERIOD

Hanks is the fourth Irish womens soccer player to win the Hermann Trophy presented annually by the Missouri Athletic Club in St PERIOD Louis Mo PERIOD



Share This Story

Coming into the season the womens soccer team knew that they would count on.. PERIOD
